enb_long_title: Seventh Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: This draft decision (FCCC/CP/2001/L.4/Rev.1) states that the GEF should provide financial resources to developing country Parties, in particular to the LDCs and Small Island Developing States (SIDS), including for implementing Stage II adaptation activities and establishing pilot or demonstration projects to show how adaptation planning and assessment can be translated into projects.
The draft decision further urges the GEF to adopt a streamlined approach in financing activities within the framework for capacity building in developing countries.
